attributes.action: make people who know about abuse occurring accessories under the law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in the light of the headlines regarding ANOTHER baby brutally tortured and murdered while under the care and "watchful eye" of social services we have to ask the question at what point do the people who KNOW become accountable for allowing abuse to perpetuate.
We need to be the voices of the voiceless.
We the undersigned beleive that those who know abuse is going on and do not act according to child protection and an individuals right to life free from torture and pain should be accountable in a court of law and serve prison time as accessories to abuse and murder.
This includes public servants, parents, and any adult who could, by their actions prevent another life destroyed.
